title: tasty and light fare
text: Came here for pre-booked lunch. Veggie options were available and very good. Beet salad for appy and spaghetti for main. Very light and excellent flavors. Did the wine pairing as well. Staff were good about COVID safety.

title: Every detail in place
text: The inn was amazing. Rooms have kept the charm of the building but upgraded for all your modern needs. Spectacular huge bathtub, very comfortable beds and gorgeous balconies. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was superb. We also managed to get in for dinner and it was one of the best meals i've had in my life. Everything very vegetarian friendly. We stayed during the start of things opening up from COVID-19 and staff were committed to safety of everyone. Highly recommend.

title: Fun, friendly and fantastic
text: Pol, Lukas and Anna were amazing and gracious on our spectacular sailing tour. They made everyone feel welcome, took challenges in stride and made a very fun trip. The views and locations were of course spectacular around the west and south of Milos. Food was good, alcohol was plentiful and company was fantastic. Highly recommended

title: Amazing and gracious hospitality
text: Eleni was amazing! She was sweet and helpful and very gracious. The room was lovely, clean and with everything you need. The place was also very quiet. Breakfast is wonderful and well worth the price, Eleni even made me a package of sweets to take with me as I left. Highly highly recommend!

title: Beautiful suites for a great price
text: Wonderful suites, in the centre of fira, not along the caldera but with good views. Very friendly staff, large and very clean rooms. Very good value, especially on Santorini. Arrange transfers for a good price.
